data.text: @reh516 @thompsonjayyma1 @Cleavon_MD I’m betting since they didn’t mention her vaccine status she was vaccinated!  They only mention it when they’re not.
@PfefferEsther @Cleavon_MD @dinerlee Probably because she was!  Trust me if she wasn’t the media would be slobbering all over themselves to tell us!
@Cleavon_MD So you want the whole world to wear a mask forever you know Covid is never going away
@thompsonjayyma1 @Cleavon_MD How do you know she wasn't?
@A_shot_of_Ri @Cleavon_MD If I am able, I can pass the info on to her friend. Thank you ❤️
@sassybibrarian @Cleavon_MD Yes for sure 💛 we have grievance support as well, for the children and spouse for free.
@A_shot_of_Ri @Cleavon_MD I’ll see what I can do. It’s so sad.

@sassybibrarian @Cleavon_MD Her family is local to Rami's Heart Covid-19 National Memorial. Please feel free to have them get in touch with us at Ramisheart@gmail.com to have her honored among others at the memorial.
@Cleavon_MD @scheib_gary So tragic! Condolences to her family! A reminder for all of us that covid is still around and still dAngerous
